Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the age and origin of the sculpture by stating that it is an ancient Mayan sculpture, when in fact it is a modern artwork created in 2014.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the sculpture is an ancient Mayan artwork.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the sculpture is an ancient Mayan sculpture based on its resemblance to the Batman character, without providing any factual basis for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation for the origin of the sculpture, stating that it was created by the artist Kimball for an exhibit at the Mexican Museum of Design, exploring the character of Batman through Mexican creativity.
